entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 11:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
